summary: Test module that validates the DeepFloyd IF image‑to‑image diffusion pipeline, providing both quick lightweight checks and extensive slower validations of core behaviours such as attention slicing, half‑precision inference, batch versus single processing consistency, model serialization, optional component handling, and xformers‑based attention integration.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the IF image‑to‑image generation pipeline to support reliable development, deployment, and maintenance of the diffusion model.
